rules.description: No guaranteed returns or certainty language about investment performance.

rules.message: Avoid implying an investment is risk-free.

rules.description: Avoid unqualified superlatives and comparative claims.
Fee claims should be precise and avoid absolutes that may become untrue.
rules.message: Fee claims must be precise and include conditions where applicable.

rules.description: Numeric return claims require strict substantiation and disclosures.
rules.message: Numeric return claims require substantiation and mandated disclosures.
requiredDisclosures: Past performance is not indicative of future results
